sn22.81:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
sn22.81:4.2: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya kosambiṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
sn22.81:4.3: Kosambiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto sāmaṃ senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya anāmantetvā upaṭṭhāke anapaloketvā bhikkhusaṃghaṃ eko adutiyo cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
sn22.81:5.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu acirapakkantassa bhagavato yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.81:5.3: “esāvuso ānanda, bhagavā sāmaṃ senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya anāmantetvā upaṭṭhāke anapaloketvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ eko adutiyo cārikaṃ pakkanto”ti.
sn22.81:5.4: “Yasmiṃ, āvuso, samaye bhagavā sāmaṃ senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya anāmantetvā upaṭṭhāke anapaloketvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ eko adutiyo cārikaṃ pakkamati, ekova bhagavā tasmiṃ samaye viharitukāmo hoti;
sn22.81:5.5: na bhagavā tasmiṃ samaye kenaci anubandhitabbo hotī”ti.
sn22.81:6.1: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena pālileyyakaṃ tadavasari.
sn22.81:6.2: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā pālileyyake viharati bhaddasālamūle.
sn22.81:6.3: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn22.81:6.5: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
sn22.81:6.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn22.81:6.7: “cirassutā kho no, āvuso ānanda, bhagavato sammukhā dhammī kathā;
sn22.81:6.8: icchāma mayaṃ, āvuso ānanda, bhagavato sammukhā dhammiṃ kathaṃ sotun”ti.
sn22.81:7.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando tehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ yena pālileyyakaṃ bhaddasālamūlaṃ yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.81:7.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinne kho te bhikkhū bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi.
sn22.81:7.4: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn22.81:7.5: “kathaṃ nu kho jānato kathaṃ passato anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hotī”ti?
sn22.81:7.6: Atha kho bhagavā tassa bhikkhuno cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn22.81:7.15: Evaṃ vicayaso desito, bhikkhave, mayā dhammo.
sn22.81:7.16: Evaṃ vicayaso desite kho, bhikkhave, mayā dhamme atha ca panidhekaccassa bhikkhuno evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn22.81:7.17: ‘kathaṃ nu kho jānato kathaṃ passato anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hotī’ti?
sn22.81:8.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, jānato kathaṃ passato anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hoti?
sn22.81:8.2: Idha bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto, sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpaṃ attato samanupassati.
sn22.81:8.3: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, samanupassanā saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:8.4: So pana saṅkhāro kiṃnidāno kiṃsamudayo kiṃjātiko kiṃpabhavo?
sn22.81:8.5: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:8.7: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:8.9: Sāpi vedanā, sopi phasso anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:8.11: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṃ passato anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:9.1: Na heva kho rūpaṃ attato samanupassati;
sn22.81:9.2: api ca kho rūpavantaṃ attānaṃ samanupassati.
sn22.81:9.3: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, samanupassanā saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:9.4: So pana saṅkhāro kiṃnidāno kiṃsamudayo kiṃjātiko kiṃpabhavo?
sn22.81:9.5: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:9.7: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:9.12: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṃ passato anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:10.1: Na heva kho rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṃ attānaṃ samanupassati;
sn22.81:10.2: api ca kho attani rūpaṃ samanupassati.
sn22.81:10.3: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, samanupassanā saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:10.4: So pana saṅkhāro kiṃnidāno kiṃsamudayo kiṃjātiko kiṃpabhavo?
sn22.81:10.5: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:10.7: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:10.12: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṃ passato anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:11.1: Na heva kho rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṃ attānaṃ samanupassati, na attani rūpaṃ samanupassati;
sn22.81:11.2: api ca kho rūpasmiṃ attānaṃ samanupassati.
sn22.81:11.3: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, samanupassanā saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:11.4: So pana saṅkhāro kiṃnidāno kiṃsamudayo kiṃjātiko kiṃpabhavo?
sn22.81:11.5: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:11.7: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:12.1: Na heva kho rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṃ attānaṃ, na attani rūpaṃ, na rūpasmiṃ attānaṃ samanupassati;
sn22.81:12.2: api ca kho vedanaṃ attato samanupassati, api ca kho vedanāvantaṃ attānaṃ samanupassati, api ca kho attani vedanaṃ samanupassati, api ca kho vedanāya attānaṃ samanupassati;
sn22.81:12.4: api ca kho saṅkhāre attato samanupassati, api ca kho saṅkhāravantaṃ attānaṃ samanupassati, api ca kho attani saṅkhāre samanupassati, api ca kho saṅkhāresu attānaṃ samanupassati;
sn22.81:12.5: api ca kho viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassati, api ca kho viññāṇavantaṃ attānaṃ, api ca kho attani viññāṇaṃ, api ca kho viññāṇasmiṃ attānaṃ samanupassati.
sn22.81:12.6: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, samanupassanā saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:12.9: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:12.11: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:12.16: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṃ passato anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:13.1: Na heva kho rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, na vedanaṃ attato samanupassati, na saññaṃ …
sn22.81:13.5: ‘so attā so loko, so pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo’ti.
sn22.81:13.6: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, sassatadiṭṭhi saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:13.8: evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṃ passato anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:14.1: Na heva kho rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, na vedanaṃ …
sn22.81:14.6: ‘so attā so loko, so pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo’ti.
sn22.81:14.8: ‘no cassaṃ no ca me siyā nābhavissaṃ na me bhavissatī’ti.
sn22.81:14.9: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, ucchedadiṭṭhi saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:14.10: So pana saṅkhāro kiṃnidāno kiṃsamudayo kiṃjātiko kiṃpabhavo?
sn22.81:14.11: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:14.13: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco … pe …
sn22.81:14.14: evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṃ passato anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:15.1: Na heva kho rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, na vedanaṃ …
sn22.81:15.5: na viññāṇasmiṃ attato samanupassati, nāpi evaṃdiṭṭhi hoti:
sn22.81:15.6: ‘so attā so loko, so pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo’ti;
sn22.81:15.8: ‘no cassaṃ no ca me siyā nābhavissaṃ na me bhavissatī’ti;
sn22.81:15.9: api ca kho kaṅkhī hoti vicikicchī aniṭṭhaṅgato saddhamme.
sn22.81:15.10: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, kaṅkhitā vicikicchitā aniṭṭhaṅgatatā saddhamme saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:15.11: So pana saṅkhāro kiṃnidāno kiṃsamudayo kiṃjātiko kiṃpabhavo?
sn22.81:15.12: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:15.14: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:15.19: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṃ passato anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hotī”ti.
